title: shipping options on warrantee replacement phone
content: why was I not given an option of shipping method on my warrantee replacement phone?  I understand that due to the pandemic and holiday season there will be shipping delays.  However I would have been willing to pay for 2 day delivery service rather than having to wait a minimum of 8 days (and potentially significantly longer) to  have the use of a phone.  It is reasonable that Google Pixel would only be willing to send a warrantee replacement items standard ground service shipping.  But if I am willing to spend my money on expedited shipping, should I not be given that option?
